english.segment1: Many mighty rivers I have crossed. Many barren deserts have I seen. And still my heart beats strong. For You, Oh Lord. For You have been my shelter. I all of my need
english.segment2: I have come to worship you. Oh, and I have come to worship you
english.segment3: A willing soul and a thankful heart. To find a holy passion just for You. And turn away from the things. That break your heart. And live a life of sacrifice. Just for You
english.segment4: For only You are worthy. Only You are worthy. Only You are worthy. Of the praise this heart brings
